item.title: vSphere HA Configuration fails: Operation Timed Out
item.description: How to troubleshoot vSphere Ha failing to configure

item.title: Teaming ReadyNAS Ultra NICs
item.description: Introduction Netgear for some reason believe that ReadyNAS models that aren’t the “Pro” line don’t require network teaming across both their ethernet ports, so you have 2 network ports on your NAS, you’ve got your jumbo frames on and you want to configure load balancing/failover via the 2 interfaces. Of course the ReadyNAS is based on Debian linux, you could SSH into the box and use /etc/network/interfaces to configure a networking bond using: mode=balance-rr or using aggregated link spec 802.
